Title: Episode #5.5
Writer: Chris Ryan (based on the book by), Jack Lothian
Actors: Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Robson Green, Milauna Jackson
Plot: Scott and Stonebridge sneak into North Korea to destroy a factory where the vanadium is being processed. Finn is kidnapped. After destroying the factory Scott and Stonebridge surrender because Mei threatens to kill Finn.
